meanings.definition: Attracting attention by being bright, colorful, or extravagant.
meanings.sent1: The dress she wore to the party was the flashiest outfit there.
meanings.sent2: The peacock displayed its flashiest feathers during the mating dance.
meanings.sent3: The flashiest car in the parking lot had a bright red paint job.
meanings.sent4: Among all the flowers in the garden, the sunflower stood out as the flashiest.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks on New Year's Eve were the flashiest display of lights in the sky.

meanings.definition: Displaying a sudden burst of light.
meanings.sent1: The lightning strike was the flashiest moment of the storm.
meanings.sent2: The camera captured the flashiest moment when the star exploded.
meanings.sent3: The flashiest glow came from the firefly in the dark forest.
meanings.sent4: The flashiest reflection off the water was caused by the lighthouse beam.
meanings.sent5: The flashiest burst of light illuminated the entire room for a split second.

meanings.sent1: The sports car can flashiest down the highway with ease.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah can flashiest across the savanna in pursuit of its prey.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to flashiest through the trees but ended up getting stuck.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to flashiest by as they enjoyed their day at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The river can flashiest through the canyon, carving its path over time.
